issue.title: Wrong rejection date is shown at product level (current date used) in recap
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Wrong rejection date is shown at product level (current date used) in recap.
Because the source of the date is a different field

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Commited in 4.3.x branch under rev.9315 (wrong Message)
